---
title: "@microviz/themes"
slug: themes
---

Base CSS tokens and layered defaults (`@layer microviz`) for styling microviz output.

## Files

- `@microviz/themes/tokens.css`: token variables only (`--mv-*`).
- `@microviz/themes/base.css`: tokens + default class styles (wrapped in `@layer microviz`).
- `@microviz/themes/variants.css`: optional theme presets (Carbon-inspired `white/g10/g90/g100`).

## Theme presets

Import `variants.css`, then apply either a class or a `data-mv-theme` attribute:

```ts
import "@microviz/themes/base.css";
import "@microviz/themes/variants.css";
```

```html
<div class="mv-theme-g90 rounded-md p-2">
  <microviz-sparkline data="[6,10,7,12,9,14]"></microviz-sparkline>
</div>

<div data-mv-theme="g10" class="rounded-md p-2">
  <microviz-sparkline data="[6,10,7,12,9,14]"></microviz-sparkline>
</div>
```
